name.description: Specifies the name of the action.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Custom Provider.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_type.description: Any number of `resource_type` block as defined below. One of `resource_type` or `action` must be specified.

action.description: Any number of `action` block as defined below. One of `resource_type` or `action` must be specified.

validation.description: Any number of `validation` block as defined below.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

endpoint.description: Specifies the endpoint of the action.

routing_type.description: The routing type that is supported for the resource request. Valid values are `ResourceTypeRoutingProxy` or `ResourceTypeRoutingProxyCache`. This value defaults to `ResourceTypeRoutingProxy`.

specification.description: The endpoint where the validation specification is located.

id.description: The ID of the Custom Provider.
